criteria: See the issues that matter in real-time and solve them faster with actionable details such as stack trace details, tags and breadcrumbs.
Track application performance, measures metrics like throughput and latency.
Repro issues faster and get a better understanding of user impact.
Monitor the health of releases by observing user adoption, usage of your application, percentage of crashes, and session data.
Configure Issue alerts as well as Metric alerts.
Leverage queries to drill into data by selecting points of interest and build dashboards based on it.
Integrate with the following applications: Slack | Jira | GitHub
